problem.markdown: While reducing the first law for open systems to Bernoulli's equation, which of the following assumptions are made? [x] Steady state [x] No stirrer work [ ] No substantial potential energy change occurs. [x] Thermal energy of mass entering at inlet is same as that exiting at the outlet.
problem.p: While reducing the first law for open systems to Bernoulli's equation, which of the following assumptions are made?

checkboxgroup.choice: No substantial potential energy change occurs.
Thermal energy of mass entering at inlet is same as that exiting at the outlet.
